Description: Spacious and very bright two bedroom WITH TWO FULL BATHS on the first floor of a beautiful Beacon Street brownstone, available September 1st! This unit features hardwood floors, high ceilings, tons of windows, a nicely updated eat-in kitchen, two very good size bedrooms and plenty of charm and character! This building has on-site management, laundry facilities, a common roof deck and parking is available for rent. Cats are allowed and this unbelievable location is steps away from The C/D trains, The Longwood Medical Area, Fenway, Back Bay and Downtown Boston.
